囆字的基本解释

囆
chài
古人名。

囆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chài］
［《集韻》丑邁切，去夬，徹。］
人名用字。春秋时郑有公孙囆。见《公羊传·襄公十四年》。按《左传》、《穀梁传》皆作“蠆”。

囆字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　囆； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页215第07
【集韻】丑邁切，音蠆。人名。【公羊傳·襄十四年】鄭公孫囆。【釋文】囆，敕邁反。【左傳】【穀梁傳】?作蠆。

囆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
囆字的起名意思

暂无。

囆
Basic explanation of words
囆
chài
Ancient names.
囆
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chài］
["Ji Yun" is ugly and cut, go to 夬, to be thorough. ]
Use characters for names. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Zheng Yougongsun Lun. See "The Fourteen Years of Gongyang Zhuan·Xianggong". According to "Zuo Zhuan" and "Gu Liang Zhuan", it is all made "虿".
囆
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　囆; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 215 Page 07
[Jiyun] Ugly cut, sound. Person's name. [The Fourteenth Year of Gongyang Zhuan] Zheng Gongsunzhen. 【Explanation】囆, 敕step forward. [Zuo Zhuan] [Gu Liang Biography]? Zuo Yu.
